about_the_game:
The Premium Edition is a tribute to our most dedicated fans and supporters. By purchasing the Premium Edition, you are not only getting access to all the exclusive content but also showing your support for the continued development and expansion of the Ultimate General series.

Soundtracks
Dive deeper into the historical ambiance of Ultimate General: American Revolution with an exclusive collection of meticulously composed soundtracks.

Wallpaper
Bring the historical grandeur of the American Revolution to your desktop. The wallpaperw will keep the spirit of the revolution alive on your screen.

Forum Avatars
Engage with the Ultimate General community using our exclusive set of forum avatars. Show off your allegiance with avatars depicting famous generals of the American Revolution.

Exclusive Unit: Morgan's Rifles
Introducing a new elite unit: "Morgan's Rifles". Named after the legendary Daniel Morgan, this sharpshooter unit brings unparalleled accuracy and deadly precision to your command. Known for their marksmanship and guerrilla tactics, Morgan's Rifles can turn the tide of battle with their expert skills. Deploy them strategically to outmaneuver and outgun your opponents, adding a new layer of tactical depth to your gameplay.

Expansion Pack: Free Additional Content
In our commitment to providing an enriching and complete experience, any additional possible content within the game will be available for free.

subs.option_text: Ultimate General: American Revolution - Premium Edition - $19.99 USD

package_groups.title: Buy Ultimate General: American Revolution - Premium Edition

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 or AMD equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX - compatible audio card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-i7 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 2060 or AMD equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX - compatible audio card

short_description: The Premium Edition is a tribute to our most dedicated fans and supporters. By purchasing the Premium Edition, you are not only getting access to all the exclusive content of the Premium Edition but also showing your support for the continued development and expansion of the Ultimate General series.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Russian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
